title: Can someone please explain why I have a 20 minute Leave Buster for the client crashing vs the old 5
body:
I wanted to post a formal request to have the "Leave Buster" status removed from my account. I attempted to play a game on Saturday night, after already playing 2, and had my client freeze during the champ loading screen. I attempted multiple restarts to the client but was unable to log back in until my team had already remade the game, which I completely understand.

What I don't follow is how I have now been placed in a 20 min Leave Buster que for something that wasn't my fault. I fully realize that people probably claim something similar to this a lot in an attempt to cheat the system. And in fact, I fully own my earlier AFK issues in Season 7 as I had a number of events pull me away from the game in a tight succession. What I don't understand is what happened to the 5 minute Leave Buster que? Am I destined to forever be stuck in a 20 minute Leave Buster for anytime I have an unexpected/unplanned AFK situation or client crash? Does this ever reset back to the 5 minute version?

Any clarification would be appreciated.

Sincerely,

-Jeff-

replies.body:
The reason it increased to a 20 min LPQ was due to the system detecting a history of leaves, and the previous LPQ hadn't had enough time to fall off your account I'm guessing. If you get a 5 game LPQ but continue leaving games for any reason you run the risk of getting hit with longer penalties to help push you towards troubleshooting the main problem. 

If your client keeps freezing like that and causing you to be marked as a 'leaver' when you never meant to, I'd start off by running a quick repair. If that doesn't help be sure to run through the other steps in this [**crash guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974) to cover the rest of the basics.

I’m on leaver buster for the same thing I just had a normal game where my client crashed twice. The second time not allowing me to comeback until the end of the game. Now I’m on 20 minute leaver buster box of it
